name: Trump 2020 Simulator
description:
The year of 2020 quickly proved to be one of the wildest years humanity had faced, but nothing could compare to what would happen next: a full out communist invasion of the United States of America. As the army ravaged and pillaged the streets and states, the future of the country now lies in the hands of one mysterious man: he who the enemy call the "orange man"™...

Trump 2020 Simulator features satirical third-person shooter game play putting you directly into a war on the streets. Acquire new weapons, save your kidnapped daughter and wife, destroy communist bases, and defeat the final leader of the communist invasion.

Features:

  • Fast-paced third person shooter game play
  • Save your kidnapped daughter Ivanka and wife Melania
  • Face Biden
  • Crush terrorist groups and restore law & order
  • Obtain new weapons
  • Explore the ruined streets
  • Destroy communist bases
  • Defeat the communist army leader and save the USA
